messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Helen
messages.msgSnippet: Helen, To me, your life sounds wonderful.  I think I am a rambler at heart.  My dream would be to just live on the road, traveling with my family, in a huge
messages.messageBody:
Helen,

To me, your life sounds wonderful. I think I am a "rambler" at heart. My
dream would be to just live on the road, traveling with my family, in a huge
motor home. Seeing the world and just LIVING in it. sigh.. Oh well, welcome
back, the list may be a little mellow right now , but its been pretty heated
at times as well. Looking forward to getting to know you better

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
